ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 51. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
